en_title: Secretary for Justice to attend working meeting with Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Beijing
zh_title: 律政司司長訪北京出席外交部工作會議

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Beijing from tomorrow (December 7) to December 9 to attend the annual high-level working meeting with the Department of Treaty and Law of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to enhance mutual understanding on legal and judicial matters between Hong Kong and the Mainland.
Mr Yuen will also attend the signing ceremony of legal exchange and co-operation arrangements between the Department of Justice and the China University of Political Science and Law.
During his stay in Beijing, he will meet with officials of the Supreme People's Court and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to discuss issues of mutual concern.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon on December 9.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（十二月七日）至十二月九日訪問北京，出席與外交部條約法律司的周年高層工作會議，藉此加強雙方對彼此的法律和司法事宜的了解。
袁國強並會出席律政司與中國政法大學有關法律交流和合作安排的簽署儀式。
在北京期間，他將與最高人民法院和外交部的官員會面，討論雙方關注的議題。
袁國強將於十二月九日下午返港。
